title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Boil the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
Beat the eggs in a bowl and mix with grated cheese and pepper.
Drain the spaghetti and mix everything together in a pan.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
instructions: Marinate the chicken with tikka masala paste.
Simmer the tomato sauce and add grilled chicken and cream.
